metadata.Title: CVE-2012-1093 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The init script in the Debian x11-common package before 1:7.6+12 is vulnerable to a symlink attack that can lead to a privilege escalation during package installation.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs

criterions.comment: xorg package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
